trans-unit.source: Recent dedicated servers come with an IPMI interface. A lightweight control board embedded on the server. Using IPMI, it is possible to get a remote screen on a server. This is particularly useful to tweak the BIOS or troubleshoot boot issues.
trans-unit.target: Los servidores dedicados recientes vienen con una interfaz IPMI.Un tablero de control liviano incrustado en el servidor.Usando IPMI,es posible obtener una pantalla remota en un servidor.Esto es particularmente útil para ajustar el BIOS o solucionar problemas de arranque.

trans-unit.source: Thanks to the application key / consumer key mechanism, it is possible to finely track applications having access to your data and revoke this access. This examples lists validated applications. It could easily be adapted to manage revocation too.
